attributes.action: Force Amenity providers to lower their prices
attributes.additional_details:
It was announced that various companies (British Gas for example) have made a 700% increase in profit margin  yet they still feel the need to increase the charges.

Even with a 700% profit margin some companies are still  going ahead with increasing the charges for their service. The government needs to step in and force these companies to stop increasing the charges and infact force then to lower their charges.
